name: Referential
description: The fastest API to access countries, states, cities, continents, dial and zip codes in up to 20 languages. A collection of data APIs to support forms, signups, search and lookup. Our endpoints are optimized for speed and size. Our data is regularly maintained and comes from International Standardization bodies, the United Nations, government surveys and GIS datasets. We do not scrape WikiPedia etc

api_methods.name: Languages
api_methods.description: List the world's languages translated into 20 languages

parameters.name: lang_3
parameters.description: Filter by 3 letter ISO language code

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Select fields to return in result [flag,iso_a2,lang_3,lang]

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Returns a language translated into lang language

utterances.utterance: Can you show me the list of all languages spoken in Japan translated into French?
I want to see the language details for Spanish, including its three-letter ISO code and flag icon.
Please provide the names of all languages in Germany translated into German.
List the languages spoken in Brazil with their two-letter country codes and flags, translated into Portuguese.
Could you find the language information for the three-letter code 'rus' and show it in English?
Show me all languages available in Canada, translated into Spanish, including their flags.
I need the list of languages spoken in South Korea with their ISO codes, translated into Korean.
Retrieve the language details for the three-letter code 'ara' and translate the language name into Arabic.
Give me the languages spoken in Italy, translated into Italian, showing only the language names and flags.
Find all languages in Russia and translate their names into Russian, including their ISO two-letter country codes.
